From Wiktionary, the free dictionary
See also: oktober, október, and Ɔktober

Afrikaans

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • Audio:(file)

Noun

[edit]

Oktober (plural Oktobermaande)

  1. October

See also

[edit]
Gregorian calendar monthsedit
  • Januarie
  • Februarie
  • Maart
  • April
  • Mei
  • Junie
  • Julie
  • Augustus
  • September
  • Oktober
  • November
  • Desember

German

[edit]

Alternative forms

[edit]
  • October

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin Octōber, from octō (“eight”).

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /ɔkˈtoːbɐ/
  • Audio:(file)
  • Audio (Germany (Berlin)):(file)
  • Audio:(file)

Noun

[edit]

Oktober m (strong, genitive Oktobers or Oktober, plural Oktober)

  1. October

Declension

[edit]
Declension of Oktober [masculine, strong]
singular plural
indef. def. noun def. noun
nominative ein der Oktober die Oktober
genitive eines des Oktobers, Oktober der Oktober
dative einem dem Oktober den Oktobern
accusative einen den Oktober die Oktober

Coordinate terms

[edit]
Gregorian calendar months: Monate im gregorianischen Kalenderedit
  • Januar, (Austria, South Tyrol) Jänner
  • Februar, (Austria, dated) Feber
  • März
  • April
  • Mai
  • Juni, Juno
  • Juli, Julei
  • August
  • September
  • Oktober
  • November
  • Dezember

Derived terms

[edit]
  • Oktoberfest

Descendants

[edit]
  • → Estonian: oktoober

Further reading

[edit]
  • “Oktober” in Digitales Wörterbuch der deutschen Sprache
  • “Oktober” in Uni Leipzig: Wortschatz-Lexikon
  • “Oktober” in Duden online
  • Oktober on the German Wikipedia.Wikipedia de

Indonesian

[edit]
Indonesian Wikipedia has an article on:
Oktober
Wikipedia id

Etymology

[edit]

From Dutch oktober, from Latin Octōber (“eighth month”), from Latin octō (“eight”), from Proto-Indo-European *oḱtṓw (“twice four”). October was the eighth month in the Roman calendar.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • (Standard Indonesian) IPA(key): /okˈtobər/ [ok̚ˈt̪o.bər]
  • Rhymes: -obər
  • Syllabification: Ok‧to‧ber

Proper noun

[edit]

Oktobêr

  1. October

Coordinate terms

[edit]
Gregorian calendar months: bulan-bulan kalender Gregoriusedit
  • Januari
  • Februari
  • Maret
  • April
  • Mei
  • Juni
  • Juli
  • Agustus
  • September
  • Oktober
  • November
  • Desember

Further reading

[edit]
  • “Oktober”, in Kamus Besar Bahasa Indonesia [Great Dictionary of the Indonesian Language] (in Indonesian), Jakarta: Agency for Language Development and Cultivation – Ministry of Education, Culture, Research, and Technology of the Republic of Indonesia, 2016

Luxembourgish

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): [okˈtoːbɐ]
  • Audio:(file)

Proper noun

[edit]

Oktober m

  1. October

See also

[edit]
Gregorian calendar months: Méint am Gregorianesche Kalenneredit
  • Januar
  • Februar
  • Mäerz
  • Abrëll
  • Mee
  • Juni
  • Juli
  • August
  • September
  • Oktober
  • November
  • Dezember

Malay

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from English October, from Middle English, from Old English, from Latin Octōber, from octō, from Proto-Indo-European *oḱtṓw.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): [ɔk.to.bə(r)]
  • Rhymes: -bə(r), -ə(r)
  • Hyphenation: Ok‧to‧ber

Proper noun

[edit]

Oktober (Jawi spelling اوکتوبر)

  1. October (tenth month of the Gregorian calendar)

See also

[edit]
Gregorian calendar months: bulan-bulan takwim Gregoryedit
  • Januari
  • Februari
  • Mac, Maret
  • April
  • Mei
  • Jun
  • Julai
  • Ogos
  • September
  • Oktober
  • November
  • Disember

Further reading

[edit]
  • “Oktober”, in Pusat Rujukan Persuratan Melayu [Malay Literary Reference Centre] (in Malay), Kuala Lumpur: Dewan Bahasa dan Pustaka, 2017
